hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported:'A'isha (Allah be pleated with her) thought of buying a slave-girl and emancipating her, but her owners refused to (sell her but on the condition) that the right of inheritance would vest in them. She made a mention of that to Allah's Messenger (ï·º). whereupon he said: Let this (condition) not stand in your way for the right of inheritance vests with one who emancipates
